DOC.brief_summary: The present study assess health-related quality life diabetic transmetatarstal below-knee prosthetic user . The study design cross-sectional retrospective review patient hospital record assessment patient-reported outcome measure .
DOC.brief_title: Heath-related Quality Life Diabetic Transmetatarsal Amputees Below-knee Prosthetic Users
DOC.detailed_description: The present study aim recruit 100 diabetic transmetatarsal below-knee prosthetic user ass health-related quality life ( HRQoL ) two patient group . The 15D HRQoL instrument apply . An additional comparison age-standardized Finnish general population perform .
DOC.criteria: Patients diabetes Transmetatarsal amputation Belowknee prosthetic user 25 year surgery No diabetes Other transmetatarsal belowknee amputation Belowknee amputation belowknee prosthetic user Less 2 year amputation Over 5 year amputation
